entity_action_chosen.command: give @s written_book{pages:['["",{"text":"Welcome to your trial, my child.\\nI wish that I did not have to do this, but your actions have forced my hand.\\n\\nWhere you are now is a planet I chose to test you.\\nAnd it "},{"text":"will","italic":true},{"text":" test you.\\n ","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"Even more so, because you mustn\'t hurt a single thing. Not one creature.\\nNot like you did.\\n\\nDo this, and I will see you as worthy of Ascension once again.\\n "}','["",{"text":"Fail...and you will not like the consequences.\\n\\n\\n\\nGood luck, Fallen One. \\nReclaim your place here once again.\\nI know you can do it.\\n\\n"},{"text":"-","italic":true},{"text":"Gardener","italic":true,"obfuscated":true}]'],title:Trials,author:"The Gardener",display:{Lore:["It glows with a warm light."]}}
